texto: relationship between the processes defined within the process reference model. This is provided in 5.6 The process reference model shall document the community of interest of the model and the actions taken to achieve consensus within that community of interest: [ISO/IEC 33020, 5.3.2] a) the relevant community of interest shall be characterized or specified; The relevant community of interest is the users of ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 and ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207. b) the extent of achievement of consensus shall be documented; Both ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 and ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207 are international standards satisfying the consensus requirements of ISO/IEC and IEEE.
